articles.title: Cricbuzz Chatter: ENG v IND, 5th Test, Day 5 Review ft. Harsha Bhogle & Michael Vaughan - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Joe Root & Jonny Bairstow take England home in a canter, squaring the series 2-2. Join Harsha Bhogle & Michael Vaughan review Day 5, on Cricbuzz Chatter#BenS...
